min.description: Minimum domain value of the axis

max.description: Maximum domain value of the axis

facetDomain.description: Whether the axis domain should be the same across faceted charts (if possible)

numDecimalPlaces.description: DEPRECATE: this field has not been used in 1y or more

customNumericLabels.description:
Custom labels for each numeric bin. Only applied when strategy is `manual`.
`null` falls back to default label.

customCategoryColors.description: Map of categorical values to colors. Colors are CSS colors, usually in the form `#aa9944`

baseColorScheme.description: One of the predefined base color schemes

equalSizeBins.description: Whether the visual scaling for the color legend is disabled.

customHiddenCategories.description: Allow hiding categories from the legend

binningStrategy.description: The strategy for generating the bin boundaries

legendDescription.description: A custom legend description. Only used in ScatterPlot legend titles for now.

customNumericColors.description:
Override some or all colors for the numerical color legend.
Colors are CSS colors, usually in the form `#aa9944`
`null` falls back the color scheme color.

customNumericValues.description: Custom maximum brackets for each numeric bin. Only applied when strategy is `manual`

customNumericColorsActive.description: Whether `customNumericColors` are used to override the color scheme

colorSchemeInvert.description: Reverse the order of colors in the color scheme

customCategoryLabels.description: Map of category values to color legend labels.

binningStrategyBinCount.description: The *suggested* number of bins for the automatic binning algorithm

customNumericMinValue.description: The minimum bracket of the first bin

description:
Our World In Data grapher configuration. Most of the fields can be left empty and will be
filled with reasonable default values.

id.description: Internal DB id. Useful internally for OWID but not required if just using grapher directly.

map.description: Configuration of the world map chart

projection.description: Slightly misnamed - this does not change the map projection but instead specifies which world area to focus on.

hideTimeline.description: Whether the timeline should be hidden in the map view and thus the user not be able to change the year

timeTolerance.description:
Tolerance to use. If data points are missing for a time point, a match is accepted if it lies
within the specified time period. The unit is the dominating time unit, usually years but can be days for
daily time series.

tooltipUseCustomLabels.description: Show the label from colorSchemeLabels in the tooltip instead of the numeric value

time.description: Select a specific time to be displayed.

variableId.description: Variable ID to show. TODO: remove this and use dimensions instead

maxTime.description: End point of the initially selected time span.

subtitle.description: The longer subtitle text to show beneath the title

baseColorScheme.description: The default color scheme if no color overrides are specified

tab.description: The tab that is shown initially

matchingEntitiesOnly.description: Exclude entities that do not belong in any color group

hasChartTab.description: Whether to show the (non-map) chart tab

data.description: Obsolete name - used only to store the available entities

timelineMinTime.description:
The lowest year to show in the timeline. If this is set then the user is not able to see
any data before this year

variantName.description: Optional internal variant name for distinguishing charts with the same title

hideTimeline.description: Whether to hide the timeline from the user. If it is hidden then the user can't change the time

originUrl.description: The page containing this chart where more context can be found

scatterPointLabelStrategy.description:
When a user hovers over a connected series line in a ScatterPlot we show
a label for each point. By default that value will be from the "year" column
but by changing this option the column used for the x or y axis could be used instead.

selectedFacetStrategy.description: The desired facetting strategy (none for no facetting)

sourceDesc.description: Short comma-separated list of source names

isPublished.description: Indicates if the chart is published on Our World In Data or still in draft

invertColorScheme.description: Reverse the order of colors in the color scheme

hideRelativeToggle.description: Whether to hide the relative mode UI toggle. Default depends on the chart type

comparisonLines.description: List of vertical comparison lines to draw

slug.description: Slug of the chart on Our World In Data

logo.description: Which logo to show on the upper right side

entityType.description: Display string for naming the primary entities of the data. Default is 'country', but you can specify a different one such as 'state' or 'region'

note.description: Note displayed in the footer of the chart. To be used for clarifications etc about the data.

dimensions.description: List of dimensions and their mapping to variables

targetYear.description:
Charts that can display more than one primary dimensions (i.e. scatter and marimekko)
sometimes need to "hardcode" one dimension to a specific year. This happens e.g. when
mixing a daily X variable in a scatter plot with a yearly one, e.g. population.

id.description: DEPRECATE - drop this at some point

order.description: DEPRECATE - drop this at some point

chartId.description: DEPRECATE - drop this at some point

property.description: Which dimension this property maps to

numDecimalPlaces.description: DEPRECATE - drop this at some point

isProjection.description:
Indicates if this time series is a forward projection (if yes then this is rendered
differently in e.g. line charts)

name.description: The display string for this variable

tableDisplay.description: Configuration for the table sheet for this variable

tolerance.description:
Tolerance to use. If data points are missing for a time point, a match is accepted if it lies
within the specified time period. The unit is the dominating time unit, either years or days.

yearIsDay.description: Switch to indicate if the number in the year column represents a day (since zeroDay) or not i.e. a year

color.description: Default color for this time series

includeInTable.description: Whether to render this time series in the table sheet

shortUnit.description: Short unit symbol - This is used in tight UI spaces when the value is shown

conversionFactor.description: Conversion factor to apply before showing values

unit.description: Long unit text - This is shown in the UI when there is more space (e.g. tooltips) after values

numDecimalPlaces.description: Number of decimal places to show

zeroDay.description: Iso date day string for the starting date if yearIsDay is used

variableId.description: The variable id to get the values for this time series

addCountryMode.description: Whether the user can change countries, add additional ones or neither

compareEndPointsOnly.description: Drops in between points in scatter plots

title.description: Big title text of the chart

type.description: Which type of chart should be shown (hasMapChart can be used to always also show a map chart)

hasMapTab.description: Indicates if the map tab should be shown

stackMode.description: Stack mode. Only absolute and relative are actively used.

minTime.description: Start point of the initially selected time span.

hideTitleAnnotation.description: Whether to hide any automatically added title annotations like the selected year

excludedEntities.description: Entities that should be excluded from the chart

timelineMaxTime.description:
The highest year to show in the timeline. If this is set then the user is not able to see
any data after this year

hideConnectedScatterLines.description: Whether to hide connecting lines on scatter plots when a time range is selected

showNoDataArea.description: Whether to show an area for entities that have no data (currently only used in marimekko charts)

zoomToSelection.description: Whether to zoom to the selected data points

minPopulationFilter.description: Cutoff for the minimum population filter that users can toggle on some charts

showYearLabels.description: Whether to show year labels in bar charts

hideLinesOutsideTolerance.description: Hide entities without data for full time span (within tolerance)

hideTotalValueLabel.description: Whether to hide the total value label (used on stacked discrete bar charts)

sortBy.description: Sort criterium (used by stacked bar charts and marimekko)

sortOrder.description: Sort order (used by stacked bar charts and marimekko)

sortColumnSlug.description: Sort column if sortBy is column (used by stacked bar charts and marimekko)

hideFacetControl.description: Whether to hide the faceting control

includedEntities.description: Entities to include. Opposite of excludedEntities. If this is set then all entities not specified here are excluded.

highlightToggle.description: Enable highlight toggle on scatter plots

entityTypePlural.description: Plural of the entity type (i.e. when entityType is 'country' this would be 'countries')
